website_summaries.verdict: This 6-foot goal can handle shots fired up to 90 mph with ease. Folds down quickly for easy transportation.
pros: Easy to set up and fold down, when folded is 4 feet tall
Quality 17-gauge steel frame construction with powder coating
Supplied net is UV protected for longevity
cons: Some users report receiving incomplete sets and missing hardware

customer_reviews.title: missing seven parts The missing parts issue, is the ...
customer_reviews.text: missing seven parts The missing parts issue, is the same as another review (June 2017) for this product - probably received THAT guy's returned box and then I tried to make it work. We were missing a major orange metal V shaped tube section, folding section bolds, locking nuts, pull pin, wrench, etc. It can't be a coincidence that other buyers/review have the same issue of multiple pieces missing.
customer_reviews.author: A B

customer_reviews.title: MISSING MAIN CROSS BAR- NOT USABLE
customer_reviews.text: Not usable-- consistent with other reviews, it was shipped to us missing a very important piece: the top center cross bar. How can so many of these goals be shipped out missing parts-- sometimes huge parts?
customer_reviews.author: NYCmom

customer_reviews.title: Great goal for daily use
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, foldable, easy to setup. My 11 yr old basically put the entire thing together himself. I helped get the rope started that connects the net to frame, but that was about it. Has been using it daily since we got it.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: It is great! Much easier assembly than I expected
customer_reviews.text: We have a modest sized yard and I'd resisted buying a goal given how much space it would take up. I took the plunge on this model bc it folds away for storage. It is great! Much easier assembly than I expected. My 13 year old was able to assemble the frame on his own, and then we laced up the netting together. About 90 minutes start to finish (we are not handy people). The included instructions are ok but also we found multiple short video tutorials online on how to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: ESMD

customer_reviews.title: San Diego Salt Air Killed It
customer_reviews.text: We've had this just over a year. It worked well until it rusted and collapsed. It was a little tedious to assemble, but not at all difficult. It's easy to fold and has decent weight to it, but it just couldn't stand up to the rust. It completely collapsed and basically snapped in half today. I just saw that the net has a lifetime warranty(!!) which is surprising. Our net had TONS of holes in it in under a year. We tied additional rope to close the holes and didn't worry about it. I expected the net to fail, not the entire structure.
customer_reviews.author: SD91932

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: This review if going to be a little unfair because I bought this as a backup for my Rage Cage which is amazing. 1st it is not a Rage Cage, BUT it is pretty good. You would still have a hard time transporting it in anything short of a truck bed or trailer, but it does fold pretty flat. The frame is fairly solid and the net is pretty good, but if you have a High School shooter, do not be surprised with holes appearing in your net and dents in the frame. Overall good.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas P. Grotenhuis

customer_reviews.title: Great Cage
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lacrosse net. It went together fast an easy. The only problem is the lacing of the net to the frame. They don't really tell you how many squares to skip when lacing the top frame. You have to lace through every 3rd square to on the top frame and the bottom frame to make sure you have enough cord to go all the way around. Also make sure you lace the top frame and the bottom frame seperately
customer_reviews.author: Chris Gorman

customer_reviews.title: Great lacrosse goal for the backyard
customer_reviews.text: Love this lacrosse goal for the price. Perfect for the at-home net. The kids throw the balls in there for hours at a time. I leave the goal out year round and it has lasted more than year even in elements—even the netting doesn’t have holes more than a year in. I assembled this goal by myself; it took a little time to do but was probably no less difficult than other similar goals. I would purchase this goal again, no question about it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M.

customer_reviews.title: The instructions could be soooo much better... but still, a very nice goal for the price
customer_reviews.text: The assembly of the frame was pretty straight forward, except for the bottom corner pieces. The instructions were not very clear. The net itself was not as thick as I would have liked, so I used a heavier one from my old goal (it was old and it broke, which is why I needed to purchase a new one). The goal is not lightweight, but it is not too heavy either. I wish it had wheels to move it around when putting it away. I do like that we can fold it up and store it during bad weather. For the price this is a very nice goal. I expect it will last us a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Malaga

customer_reviews.title: Great Goal
customer_reviews.text: Great Net! Net goes together pretty easy, net may be a hassle for some. Net is easy to store with just simply removing 2 pins. I purchased the EZGoal hockey net for kids and it has been solid for a few years and takes slap shots and still holding strong, so this LAX net should be solid-same material. Price is Great on Amazon as seller is here in Ct and wants $110 through there own site!!!
customer_reviews.author: BONES

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great goal. My son started lacrosse and was looking for a goal to practice with. This one seems nice. It's not as heavy duty as I expected it to be- it blows over on windy days and it's not very easy to store. We keep ours outside, and we don't store it or fold it. If you're looking for a portable goal, then this is not the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: TJinSB

customer_reviews.title: Great goal!
customer_reviews.text: No issues at all. I ordered from amazon warehouse and it arrived in original packaging and everything was included. Another great purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Nice, high quality Lacrosse net (but not very portable)
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice and sturdy Lacrosse goal, but it's not very portable. Yes, it's foldable, but at 6 ft x 6 ft, it would only fit in the back of a pickup. That said, it's very solid and seems to be very well made (time will tell). Putting the net on was a little bit of trial and error (Hint: use zip ties to hold the net in place while you string it), but overall, I'm very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: SD Family of 5

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and is sturdy the net is thick and solid as it should be. my daughter loves it! In my pic the bottom is narrower that the top because I'm using bungee cords to pull the net tight to the front so the balls roll out in front of the goal.
customer_reviews.author: My kids are ready

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and net is good
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and net is good. Plenty of cord for the stringing the net. Use zip ties or a bungy to hold net in place while you are stringing it, will help you get a good fit around the frame
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: It did not last
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this item once and it came with a part missing. We tried to contact the company directly with no luck. So we ordered it again and got the new part and returned the rest to amazon, super easy. It didn't last long though. The hinges that make it able to fold up easily bent out of shape so the pins would not stay in and now it won't stay up. It's folded up so nicely which is what I wanted but is not usable for a lacrosse goal anymore. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Good quality though
customer_reviews.text: Original picture has the target on it. Picture was deceiving because I then had to order the target separately. Good quality though.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Gnojek

customer_reviews.title: Nice net.  A bit of a pain to thread the net.
customer_reviews.text: Assembly of the frame is simple. The net is a bit of a pain to lace onto the frame, but once finished it's easy to fold up and store.
customer_reviews.author: C. Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Defective part
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I received well in time. Part 1204L was damaged and did not fit in. I called EZGOAL customer support and go quick response to replace it. Thanks Ezgoal!!
customer_reviews.author: Brij Mair

customer_reviews.title: Great net
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this net. Still looks brand new after months of use and being left out in harsh New England weather.
customer_reviews.author: chapin

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the money! Assembled in under 2 hours. The net took the longest time!
customer_reviews.author: victoria

customer_reviews.title: opinion
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sturdy. Assembly not as simple as others alluded too. Directions a c- at best. Folding system jams..ie..hard to get pins in and out. Worth the money but far from hassle free.
customer_reviews.author: opinion

customer_reviews.title: Durable and well designed.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Took about 1/2 hour to assemble and lace up, but the results are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: MSalyer

customer_reviews.title: Big and study /folds up easily.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is big, and easy to put together. It folds in half and can be moved easily. It doesn’t fit in a trunk though. The frame is sturdy so it’s not light, but works well for longevity. Don’t get overwhelmed by the netting instructions, it’s easier than it reads. YouTube clears it up. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee R.

customer_reviews.title: This is genius
customer_reviews.text: How have I lived without this for this long?? Perfect to fold up and hang on the garage wall for the winter months. Great quality, too. Super happy lax player and super happy mom! Win-win
customer_reviews.author: Maureen D.

customer_reviews.title: Good goal needs better instructions
customer_reviews.text: It's great the issue is the instructions are a bit lacking.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Nice goal
customer_reviews.text: Son loved it, very sturdy and the net is of professional quality. Husband complained about the set up the whole time so that was the only Con
customer_reviews.author: Br33zy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for anyone who can’t have a permanent goal. Super easy to assemble, and very easy to carry and transport. I have a truck so it fits nicely in the bed, SUV’s and car will probably have an issue with transportation. I highly recommend this goal.
customer_reviews.author: John_Kimmble

customer_reviews.title: Great after troubleshooting a bent piece of frame
customer_reviews.text: Not bad to put together with one exception. One of the pieces was bent at the end making it impossible to connect the adjoining piece. I had to work on it with a hammer to round out the opening. Some may find that they could not have put the components together without ordering a replacement piece.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Difficult Assembly
customer_reviews.text: Goal seems to be good quality. However, the assembly directions are horrible. They are pretty much worthless and you have to figure out on your own how to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Steve P

customer_reviews.title: Great Lacrosse goal
customer_reviews.text: Just as shown in picture! Easy to put together hardest part is installing the net. I recommend using some zip ties go hold it in place it will make it easier.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Time Consuming to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: Set a side a couple of hours to lace up the net. It’s a wonderful product, folds relatively flat and is extremely sturdy — just a bear to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: Caleigh

customer_reviews.title: Seems sturdy by the weight of the package. We will see come Christmas time!!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly it’s a gift so it hasn’t been opened yet but it definitely feels sturdy and is heavy so I’m assuming it’s a solid piece of equipment.. we will see come the holidays and i will try to do another review once it’s put together and being used!!
customer_reviews.author: bryan s.

customer_reviews.title: Great practice goal!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The goal was very easy to assemble and string up. It has stood the initial test of over 300 shots from a HS player. Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: FC

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: Great product for an even better price! Easy to assemble and love the fact that it can be easily folded and stored away!
customer_reviews.author: good game

customer_reviews.title: Read all of the bad reviews first and listen to them!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot even give half a star. I had read poor reviews and should’ve listened. The bars were bent and missing the metal pieces that secure the bars. Horribly disappointed and now have to try to package this back up to send back- would not recommend purchasing. Read all of the reviews and take them seriously!
customer_reviews.author: kathleen norkol

customer_reviews.title: EZGoal Lacrosse folding goal was a great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son who is learning lacrosse. The product was relatively easy to put together and seems to be very sturdy. Very happy with the purchase. When installing the net I found it easier to attach it with zip ties at the corners first and then complete the final assembly with the rope. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Norland

customer_reviews.title: Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected. Seems well made, sturdy, and has a nice thick coat of paint to slow the rust. Should last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent goal. Great price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent goal. Great price, easy to assemble. My two little lacrosse players (boy, age 8 and girl, age 7) love going out back to practice shooting on it. Very easy to move when cutting lawn. Would recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Get this one
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it. We have the rebounder too. Great for kids that love lacrosse
customer_reviews.author: Gil Adamowski

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: The goal looks sturdy. Unfortunately the black ropes to attach the net was missing and one tube was bent not allowing a connection to another piece. Called EZ Goal and impressed with their service. Filled a claim and hope to have the replacements in a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie H.

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable goal
customer_reviews.text: This was a great, lightweight goal for the price. It is regulation size and pretty easy to assemble, but the directions are very vague. I figured it out on my own and it took about 40 minutes for two people to install (lacing the net up took most of the time). I'd definitely recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan M.

customer_reviews.title: Simple quality
customer_reviews.text: Frame is durable, net is quality, and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Pat M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves it nice and sturdy goal Nice price Fast delivery
customer_reviews.author: MCJ

customer_reviews.title: Only Christmas present that is still being used.
customer_reviews.text: Clothes, outgrown. Drone, in the corner collecting dust. Lacrosse net, used at least twice a week for an hour or so at a time. My daughter loves it too for a mini soccer goal! Folds up if you want it put away, light enough to move it to mow around. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Vabliss

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and good quality. I’m sure we will get a long life out of it. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: TMP

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality. Boys love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boys to replace our rusted out goal. Excellent quality. Boys love it.
customer_reviews.author: Slopeslider

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly. Net took some time to setup
customer_reviews.text: Son loves it! Uses it everyday. Easy assembly. Net took some time to setup.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: This is great quality. Durable and heavy
customer_reviews.text: This is great quality. Durable and heavy. I was afraid that it wouldn't be good quality but I was pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: deweese30

customer_reviews.title: 5 star product
customer_reviews.text: A great product for a gift. Our son loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C. Calhoun

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for a quality product
customer_reviews.text: So much cheaper than national retail chains... What a deal and I did not even have to carry it to my car. Easy assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Beth and Jean

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my 15 year old son. He shoots on it almost daily. It was simple to put together, though its a smoother process with 2 people. It has held up well so far-no holes. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: My husband and son put it together fairly quickly. ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband and son put it together fairly quickly. Neither one is very handy with tools and directions, but this went very smoothly!
customer_reviews.author: A. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and light enough for my son ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and light enough for my son and I to get it out of garage and into yard.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki M.

customer_reviews.title: Home goal.
customer_reviews.text: Great net for home use. Light and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Iam4bama

customer_reviews.title: Great net
customer_reviews.text: I’m a beginner lax player and it works good for me! I was a little confused on how to put the net on it because the instructions didn’t say but I figured it out.
customer_reviews.author: hernandez

customer_reviews.title: putting this together was time consuming,
customer_reviews.text: putting this together was time consuming, but well worth it and also serves as a soccer net for our other son
customer_reviews.author: marchell cannon

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Kind of a pain to put the net on. But it is solid and should last.
customer_reviews.author: A mom

customer_reviews.title: Family Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and the kids are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mbeth G.

customer_reviews.title: Shipping??!?!
customer_reviews.text: So the goal itself is pretty good overall it works like it sure. One of the pieces to help fold the goal came bent and it took me an extra 2 hours to fix it. The goal isn't bad though after all I just had to fix it. Could have been shipping problem but overall had to settle with 3 because of that.
customer_reviews.author: Ax

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together - great net.  Great instructions.
customer_reviews.text: This goal is easy to set up. It took about twenty minutes to put together the metal goal and thirty minutes to put together the netting. It is not super stable (it is very light), but this is expected and can be easily moved around. Net is very good quality. Highly recommend product.
customer_reviews.author: tom ladd

customer_reviews.title: Awesome goal!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed for son's lacrosse practice. Easy to put together and folds up nicely for storage. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mommyof4

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fold up and put away in the winter
customer_reviews.text: Well built. Takes a beating. Easy to fold up and put away in the winter, but still stable and rugged built.
customer_reviews.author: chuck@cmed.us

customer_reviews.title: High quality!
customer_reviews.text: I watched a video to better explain how to do the netting. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great goal
customer_reviews.text: Great net at a fraction of other brands, light weight, easy to fold and move. My 9yr old loves it
customer_reviews.author: D Williams

customer_reviews.title: Study and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I love how it folds up and fits in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Easy folding for storage
customer_reviews.text: Quality product at an affordable price. My 8th grader uses it daily. Easy folding for storage
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great net but instructions for attaching net to frame are lame
customer_reviews.author: C. Rosica

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Easy to assemble. My boy loves it. Be prepared for Rabbits etc.. to get caught in net if left unattended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as portable as we would have liked.
customer_reviews.text: Heavier than we thought it would be. Not as portable as we would have liked.
customer_reviews.author: J. A.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome goal and you cannot beat the price with Prime
customer_reviews.text: Awesome goal and you cannot beat the price with Prime. Attaching the net was a little tricky. We had to use zip ties to hold the top in place while lacing. Other than that, love this!
customer_reviews.author: Katheryn

customer_reviews.title: Great net for yard practice
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Solid construction. Netting is lasting a good while in the putdoor elements. Folding is super easy too.
customer_reviews.author: dave watson

customer_reviews.title: Missing piece
customer_reviews.text: Shipping with missing piece that is critical for assembly. Not usable and now no answer at manufacturer. Stay away from this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses this all the time to practice. I tried to get her to get the product where the ball bounces back to her but she wanted the net to work on other skills. My daughter and her friends make good use of it
customer_reviews.author: mys-elf13

customer_reviews.title: Great goal! Folds flat - you just have to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great goal! Folds flat - you just have to take the 2 pins out to fold it. So far so good after a few months of use!
customer_reviews.author: AJ4733

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice net, my daughter is very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Tom malone

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like that it folds flat, makes it easier to put away.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Whiteman

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My 12yr old loved this...easy to put together and very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: it’s fun to use but it is a little hard to get lacrosse balls out of the net
customer_reviews.author: Jon Bauroth

customer_reviews.title: love that is folds up nicely and can be easily ...
customer_reviews.text: love that is folds up nicely and can be easily stored in the garage. My daughters love it and have been really improving on their shots!
customer_reviews.author: Trixi

customer_reviews.title: Very cool
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and store. Better than a rage cage
customer_reviews.author: Oh Yeah

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy net
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy net I have had it for about a year and it holds up good in all weather.
customer_reviews.author: Eli Segal

customer_reviews.title: Lots of tying down but it looks good and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly on my backyard. Lots of tying down but it looks good and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: torogi

customer_reviews.title: Great net and worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: Kids play on this constantly! Great net and worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.text: Have not got it yet but scared it might not have all the pieces
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: Missing the ropes to lace the net onto the frame with.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Beardsley

customer_reviews.title: Wrong parts
customer_reviews.text: Came with one wrong pole. Getting a hard time on getting that pole replaced. Avoid
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. Very solid and folds! Takes some time to put on net if you are solo but very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Simple, easy, pretty sturdy. The real win is its fold-up capability. Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and solid. My 10 & 13 yr old love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Renquist

customer_reviews.title: MESSAGE SAID OFFICE WAS OPEN TODAY BUT NO ONE ANSWERED THE PHONE OR RETURNED THE MULTIPLE MESSAGES WE LEFT.
customer_reviews.text: WE THOUGHT THE KIDS WOULD BE ABLE TO PLAY LACROSSE IN THE YARD THIS WEEKEND BUT...THE BOX ARRIVED IN BAD SHAPE & MISSING A PART - NO ONE ANSWERS THE PHONE OR RETURNS MESSAGES AT THE NUMBER PROVIDED. THE GOAL IS NOT USABLE WITHOUT THE U-SHAPED TUBE ON THE BOTTOM THAT HOLDS IT ALL TOGETHER..
customer_reviews.author: mmcdhoward

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, quick to fold up for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: S.ball.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my boys to practice with
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my boys to practice with. Same goal they use for official school games too. Very good quality. Has held up well in the weather.
customer_reviews.author: SRL

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy with the convenience of being able to store it flat.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Tom

customer_reviews.title: Repackaged and missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Received the package, kids excited to start playing and for their special gift - no hardware included - bolts, pins wrench etc. package looked like it had been Returned and repackaged. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Lower your expectations - you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Product is not very solid, has many pieces do not fit together tightly. Item description says 2" pipe, but it is only 1.5 inch diameter. It's a cheap lacrosse goal and it does fold. Seems like I will might get 2 or 3 years and then I'll be shopping for something better to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Derek D.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Very easy set up takes about an hour if you know how to string it right. Can't say much about durability but I've been ripping on it for about an hour and a half and I have no problems
customer_reviews.author: cstaylor

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: As another has stated. This goal arrives with 1.5" poles. not 2" as stated.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Two words... ZIP TIES!
customer_reviews.text: Two words... ZIP TIES! Don't bother with lacing the net to the frame. Tedious at best. Use the biggest/heaviest zip ties you can find. Even though the tubes are smooth that your zipping the net to, there are enough joints and holes to make the net secure with zip ties. MUCH FASTER than lacing every fourth opening in the net with the 3 mile long black cord that comes in the box. Why the manufacturer doesn't include a bag of zip ties is beyond me... can't be that much more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Steven H.

customer_reviews.title: Assembly was pretty easy, as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was pretty easy, as advertised. Stringing this bastard is a tough job without 2-3 people. Whether you use one or two men though, it remains a rattle trap. It is light weight, folds up nicely but is awkward to carry over any distance, in that it takes two of my players to carry it. For the price however and overall quality however, it cannot be beat.
customer_reviews.author: SB

product_meta.title: EZGoal Lacrosse Folding Goal, 6 x 6-Feet, Orange
product_meta.description: Promote your name by improving your aim with the EZGOAL Steel Folding Lacrosse Goal and Tilting Rebounder (Lifetime Warranty On Goal Net). This first-class training tool will quickly perfect your shot with its easily adjustable tilting rebounder that fires high pops, grounders and line drives. It's built from optimum materials to ensure longevity throughout your career. The stable 2-inch-thick, 17 gauge steel frame has UV-protected netting that won't deteriorate when left in the elements. Why would you leave something this exceptional out in the rain when its Rock Solid folding mechanism allows you to keep it anywhere.
feature_bullets: 1.5" Powder coated 17 gauge steel frame with rigid construction
Patent pending Rock Solid folding mechanism for storing flat
Heavy duty polypropylene UV treated net
